title: Night Patrol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, search a player's house, learning if they're suspicious and learning who they visit.
- At night, choose a player to Mob. If 5 other players visit them tonight, you will learn of 3 players, one of which is evil.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you start the game as a Night Patrol, you learn of one player who is a Urinetown Corporate.

desc:
Post 4499
*Cops wander the streets, arresting people they suspect of breaking the law under the cover of night.*
